name: Bun MCP Registry Hub - Enhanced Production Dashboard-Template-1.21.13
description: Bun MCP Registry Hub v2.0: A hyper-scaled, stateful edge topology combining the speed of Bun.serve() with the consistency of Durable Objects. It bridges real-time PTY sessions and AI-contextualized registry lookups across 300 global nodes with sub-11ms p99 latency.
